agenda_items: That the Company’s audited financial statements for the year ended 31 July 2021 together with the reports of the Directors, Auditors and Audit Committee be and are hereby received and accepted.
That the re-election of the retiring directors by a single resolution be and is hereby approved.

That the re-election of Ms. Osaro Oyegun, Mr. Evans Jakpa-Johns, Mr. Joe Attueyi and Mr. Maxwell Oko who are retiring by rotation and have offered themselves up for re-election be and is hereby approved.
That Messrs. Olabode Akande & Co. be and are hereby appointed as the Auditor of the Company for the financial year ending 31 July 2022.
That the board of directors of the Company be and are hereby authorised to fix the remuneration of the Auditors.
That the following persons be and hereby nominated as the Directors to serve on the Statutory Audit Committee: Ms. Osaro Oyegun and Ms. Nnenna Onyewuchi.

That the following persons be and are hereby elected as the shareholders’ representatives on the Statutory Audit Committee: Pastor Edokpayi Wilfred, Mr. Olugbosun Banji, and Mr. Ezechukwu Augustine Nnaemeka.
The remuneration of Managers of the Company was disclosed in compliance with Section 257 of CAMA 2020.
That the board of directors of the Company be and are hereby authorized to list the shares of the Company on the London Stock Exchange.

detailed_summary:
### Summary of Corporate Disclosure Document for Ellah Lakes Plc

#### Purpose and Nature of the Disclosure
This document serves as the official record of the resolutions passed during the Annual General Meeting (AGM) of Ellah Lakes Plc, held on November 22, 2021. It outlines the decisions made regarding the company's financial statements, director elections, auditor appointments, and compliance matters.

#### Key Dates
- **AGM Date:** November 22, 2021
- **Financial Year Ended:** July 31, 2021
- **Next Financial Year Ending:** July 31, 2022

#### Company Information
- **Company Name:** Ellah Lakes Plc
- **Head Office Address:** No. 12 Ihama Road, G.R.A, Benin City, Edo State
- **Website:** www.ellahlakes.com
- **Directors:**
  - Olu Akpata
  - Chuka Mordi
  - Shehu Abubakar
  - Osaro Oyegun
  - Evans Jakpa-Johns
  - Maxwell Oko
  - Nnenna Onyewuchi
  - Enotie Ogbebor
  - Chijioke Dozie
  - Hauwa Nuru
  - Joe Attueyi
  - Charles Anajemba

#### Resolutions Passed
1. **Acceptance of Financial Statements:**
   - The audited financial statements for the year ended July 31, 2021, along with the reports from the Directors, Auditors, and Audit Committee, were received and accepted.

2. **Re-election of Directors:**
   - A single resolution was passed to approve the re-election of retiring directors.
   - The following directors were specifically re-elected:
     - Ms. Osaro Oyegun
     - Mr. Evans Jakpa-Johns
     - Mr. Joe Attueyi
     - Mr. Maxwell Oko

3. **Appointment of Auditors:**
   - Messrs. Olabode Akande & Co. were appointed as the auditors for the financial year ending July 31, 2022.

4. **Remuneration of Auditors:**
   - The board of directors was authorized to fix the remuneration of the auditors.

5. **Statutory Audit Committee Nominations:**
   - The following individuals were nominated to serve on the Statutory Audit Committee:
     - Ms. Osaro Oyegun
     - Ms. Nnenna Onyewuchi

6. **Shareholders’ Representatives on the Statutory Audit Committee:**
   - The following shareholders were elected as representatives:
     - Pastor Edokpayi Wilfred
     - Mr. Olugbosun Banji
     - Mr. Ezechukwu Augustine Nnaemeka

7. **Disclosure of Managerial Remuneration:**
   - The remuneration of managers was disclosed in compliance with Section 257 of the Companies and Allied Matters Act (CAMA) 2020.

8. **Listing of Shares:**
   - The board of directors was authorized to list the shares of the Company on the London Stock Exchange.

#### Regulatory Requirements and Compliance Matters
- The document includes compliance with Section 257 of CAMA 2020 regarding the disclosure of managerial remuneration.

#### Additional Information
- **Investors’ Relations Statement:**
  - Ellah Lakes Plc has a dedicated investors’ portal accessible via their corporate website.
  - The Investors’ Relations Officer can be contacted via email at geraldine.ofoluwa@ellahlakes.com for investment-related inquiries.

#### Signatory
- The document is signed by the Company Secretary on behalf of Ellah Lakes Plc. 

This summary encapsulates all significant details from the corporate disclosure document, ensuring clarity and completeness regarding the AGM proceedings and resolutions.
